archimate:Requirement.documentation:
People and processes which are required to run the vulnerability management service throughout the lifecycle
CIS Control 7.1 Establish and maintain a documented vulnerability management process for enterprise assets. Review and update documentation annually, or when significant enterprise changes occur that could impact this Safeguard
